Product Description

Crafted from water resistant fabric, these PureFit outdoor curtain panels ensure your outdoor living spaces and furniture are free keep dry on rainy and snowy days. Their lightweight and breathable nature allows for quick dry properties.

Our weather resistant curtains are made to last! Finished with excellent stitching and strong hems, these panels are tear resistant and can support additional weight to them without tearing up.

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

Pattern
Solid Solid Line Moroccan Leaf

Material
100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester

Package
1 panel 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels

Color Options
8 8 6 6 6

PACKAGE CONTENT & PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Our weatherproof outdoor curtains are sold in panel (1 panel in each package). Each curtain panel measures 52” width by 84” Length, a set of 2 curtain panels measures 104” width by 84” Length. The curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6”
DURABLE, BREATHABLE & PRIVACY COMFORT FABRIC: PureFit outdoor curtains are crafted from a premium, weather resistant textured fabric (100% polyester composition). Our outdoor curtains provide the perfect amount of privacy and are breathable allowing air to pass through them, creating a comfortable space
UV and FADE RESISTANT OUTDOOR CURTAINS: Our outdoor curtains block harmful UV rays from the sun and filters the amount of sunlight getting into your space creating a soft ambiance. Our fade resistant fabrics’ performance is an integral part of the fabric, not an applied finish that would wash off over time
WATERPROOF CUTAINS PERFECT FOR EVERY OUTDOOR SPACES: These waterproof panels will ensure your outdoor spaces and furniture stay free from rain or snow. They are perfect for both indoor and outdoor spaces such as bedroom, living room, patio, front porch, cabana, gazebo, and more. (For best wind resistance performances add weights at the bottom)
SIMPLE FABRIC CARE: Simply clean these outdoor curtains in a washing machine with cold water, tumble dry on low, iron at low temperature if need. Because the color goes to the core of the fiber, the fabrics will not lose their color

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

QZYL Christmas Decorations

Ideal Christmas Decoration from QZYL, great companion to spend a wonderful holiday

How did we get our start?

Christmas is the most important holiday of the year, decorate the house with family and celebrate Christmas.

What makes our products unique?

All of our Christmas decorations incorporate Christmas classic elements and designed by our designers to strive to do our best to design one-of-a-kind decorations to meet the needs and ensure each item is unique and excellent.

What problem are we solving?

All our Christmas decoration are made of high-quality materials, and the products will be inspected one by one to ensure the products are delivered in the best condition.

Outdoor Christmas Decoration – The collapsible Christmas snowmen decoration comes with 4 pre-lit LED lights for nighttime display, lighting up your yard or porch on Christmas night.
Durable and Portable – Our 4FT collapsible decoration snowmen are made from a durable metal stand and Scallion cloth, very supportive and durable to use. Can be folded up and stored when not in use.
Easy to Install – Just insert the two poles with the metal stand then hang the string lights on the stand. Slowly release the telescoping section and hook the bottom loop to secure. Insert the two arms and hang the necklace decorations.
Wide Usage – Perfect Christmas lights decor for indoors and outdoor Christmas decorations, Christmas yard decorations, Christmas party decorations, and also ideal Christmas gifts for the family to decorate home porch garden fireplace, etc.

Collapsible Lighted Christmas Snowman

  • Light-up snowmen are the perfect Christmas outdoor decoration.
  • It comes with classic Christmas elements like a red hat, a red striped scarf, and a colorful necklace.
  • The snowman’s built-in LED lights make it visible at night. Light up the outdoors or indoors to create a warm and festive atmosphere in your home.
  • Give it to your family and friends as a Christmas gift.
  • Perfect for Christmas-themed parties, Christmas indoor and outdoor decoration, or Christmas yard decoration, holidays, New Year, and all kinds of parties

Package Includes

  • 1 x Metal Round Base
  • 1 x Colorful Necklace Banner
  • 1 x Red Striped Scarf

  • 2 x Removable Hands
  • 2 x Steel Tubes
  • 4 x Lawn Stakes

Product Description

Easy Set Up for Outdoor & Indoor Lighting

Warm Tips:

The recommended installation height is 6.56ft-13.12ft, the best installation height is 8ft-9ft.If you want to install security camera on the opposite side of the battery lights, please avoid infrared directly irradiated or reflection on the sensor.Make sure batteries are inserted correctly before you test activation.It is Battery Powered, NOT Solar Powered, NOT AC Power Hardwired.Note: Please allow 1% failure rate of the outdoor motion light due to the long distance of transport maybe cause damage or accessories lost. Just find us for a replacement if there is something wrong or get your spend back if it doesn’t meet your need.

Security Lights Features:

Wattage: 4.5WLumens: 480LM(whole light fixture)Color Temperature: 5500K-6500KSensing Angle: 180degreeDetection Distance: 30-35 feetLifespan: 50,000 Hours+Voltage: 6VBattery: (4 D-cell batteries per light, not included)light coverage: 500 square footWaterproof: IP65

TOOWELL Battery Operated Outdoor Flood Lights

Instant Convenience with Motion Detector Lights

Installation instructions：

1. Use a flat head screwdriver to remove the Mounting Plate

2. Insert 4 D-cell Batteries and revert the battery lid

3. Mark the fixed position and fix the mounting plate on the wall

4. Line up the light with the mounting plate and slide the light into grooves

Package Contents:

1 x PIR LED Outdoor Motion Sensor Light

1 x User Manual

4 screws and 4 anchors

Outdoor Battery Operated Lights (NOT Solar Powered)

Friendly Motion Sensor Light Mode: With an advanced sensitive photocell sensor, the battery powered Led flood light will be activated and stay on for the 20s (when the ambient light is lower than 15LUX). Stay off at the daytime(only sensing motion in darkness). Auto LED motion detection security light like a steward ensures safety for children,pets,and the old from dusk to dawn.
Save Money on an Electrician: Outdoor battery operated floodlight adopt wireless wall-mounted design,Easy to install this outdoor lights for house and yard in minutes–No main power or wiring or professional electrician required.Where sunlight and electricity can’t reach, TOOWELL battery operated outdoor lights can light up.
Customized Your Beam Angle：Adjustable angle brings flexible light to your home. Battery powered spotlights Dual head support 135°up to down,180°side to side pivot, customized led spot lights coverage area around the house.
Efficient Battery Powered Outdoor Light: LED units output 4.5w,480lumen,5500K(daylight white), equivalent to 50W halogen light, a brand new set of 4*D batteries standby time up to 180 days. saving your electricity bill by up to 80%.
Sensitive and Durable：Battery powered Security light with upgrade technic motion sensor can be triggered by the moving human, cars, or animals up to 30 feet sensing range at 180°motion detection angle. When motion caught, it lighting.
3 Years Warranty：Based on its reliable and durable performance,we offer 3-year warranty while others are just 1 year，customer service team provides 7*24 hrs help, and your satisfaction is 100% guaranteed. You don’t need to send the prdoduct back if TOOWELL product did not meet your expectation,Please contact us and get your money back.

Easy Set Up for Outdoor & Indoor Lighting

Warm Tips:

  • The recommended installation height is 6.56ft-13.12ft, the best installation height is 8ft-9ft.
  • If you want to install security camera on the opposite side of the battery lights, please avoid infrared directly irradiated or reflection on the sensor.
  • Make sure batteries are inserted correctly before you test activation.
  • It is Battery Powered, NOT Solar Powered, NOT AC Power Hardwired.
  • Note: Please allow 1% failure rate of the outdoor motion light due to the long distance of transport maybe cause damage or accessories lost. Just find us for a replacement if there is something wrong or get your spend back if it doesn’t meet your need.

Warranty & Support

Price: $69.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:27 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights with 2 GFCI Outlet

Specification

Voltage: 110-125v

Color:White

Power Source: Corded-Electric

14.5 AWG Input Wire

Max Load : 1080w

Installation Type: Hardwired/Wall Mount

Sensing Range: Distance 33FT, Angle 270°

Material: Aluminum & Tempered Glass

Color: Matte Black & Hand-painting Golden Edge

Base Type: E26 Base, 100W Max.

3 Upgraded Motion Sensor Lighting Modes

Just turn the wall switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2sec. to shift to manual mode, keeping 100% brightness at night for 8 hours, but will auto turn off at dawn.

Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection.

These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected. (It is the high mode when it arrives)

Easy access to any outdoor activity when you need power

About GFCI Outlet

Simply turn on the light and plug in your security cameras, party party décor, power tools, garden tools, etc.

Plugged the device into the GFCI outlet, if the device is not powered, please check the following steps:

1) Please check whether the device is plugged into the GFCI outlet tightly.

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

Weather Resistance & Durability

In addition to the rust-resistant aluminum and water-resistant matter black coating, this exterior house light has passed salt spray testing and multiple weather conditions such as heavy rain, snowstorms, hurricanes and hot sun to protect the light body. The sturdy aluminum material and tempered glass ensure that it will not rust or corrode for years

Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor

Upgrade the dusk to dawn motion sensor, through infrared induction, when the detection of motion will light up, no detection when closed, to save you power.

GFCI Outlet

Built-in 2 GFCI OUTLET for your outdoor power supply with added protection against surges, short circuits and other electrical faults

【3 LIGHT MODES】: The upgraded outdoor lights are built-in dusk to dawn motion sensor and bringing 3 working modes. (Manual / Low / High)①Manual mode: just turn the wall-mounted switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2 secondso shift to manual mode,keeping 100% brightness for 8 hours at night ,the dusk-to-dawn sensor detects morning and will automatically turn off. (Note: light switch in ON position, Sensing distance: 33FT, Sensing angle: 270°),②Low Mode: Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection. ③High Mode: These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected
【CLASSIC STYLE & MULTIPLE-SCENE】: Vintage rustic design that adds sophistication to any outdoor decor, this outside lights the aluminum finish pairs perfectly with most outdoor occasions, such as patio,garages,balcony,front porches,doorways,gardens,hallways
【WEATHER RESISTANT & STURDY MATERIAL】: White dusk to dawn motion sensor front porch lights , using rust-proof metal frame and thickened reinforced tempered water glass as a lampshade, lamp bezel coating waterproof golden quality aluminum, can waterproof, corrosion-resistant, anti-rust, can effectively resist heavy rain, snow, ice, high temperature and other weather, in these weather conditions, can be used for a longer period of time than the light fixtures on the market and don’t worry about the quality of the problem.
【RECOMMENDED BULB & E26 BASE】: Our outdoor wall sconce does not include a bulb and uses a UL listed E26 base for long life, compatible with any kind of standard E26 LED bulb/incandescent bulb (Max 60W), the open design of the bottom of this fixture makes it easy for you to install the bulb or clean the fixture without disassembly, for a better experience, it is recommended to choose a dimmable incandescent or LED bulb, otherwise it will malfunction or flicker
【EASY INSTALLATION】: The package of the porch light comes with installation instructions and mounting hardware, just finish the installation on the wall, remember to press the “Reset” or “Test” button between the GFCI sockets to reset the sockets and test the use, otherwise the light will probably not turn on, there will be no power output on the sockets, induction Sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time are not adjustable, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about this outdoor light.
【IMPORTANT NOTE】When the motion sensing is on for the first time (Enter Test Mode, it can also be sensed during the day in this mode), the light will be turned off after 5 seconds. When the motion sensing is on again after 2 minutes (Automatically Enter Normal Working Mode, it only can be sensed on the night in this mode), the light will be turned off after 2 minutes. After that, every time it is sensed, it is Normal Working Mode.If you are not familiar with electrical knowledge, please contact an electrician to install
【3-Year Warranty】We provide 3 years warranty and replacement or refund within 30 days; Although we trust the premium design and high-end quality of our product, if you are not satisfied, you can ask for a full refund with no additional questions asked. If you have any questions about our products, please log in to your account, check the order ID and click “Contact Seller” to contact us;Our customer service will solve your problem within 24 hours

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

  • When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.
  • Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

When the motion sensing is on again after 2 minutes (Automatically Enter Normal Working Mode, it only can be sensed on the night in this mode), the light will be turned off after 2 minutes. After that, every time it is sensed, it is Normal Working Mode.If you are not familiar with electrical knowledge, please contact an electrician to install
【3-Year Warranty】We provide 3 years warranty and replacement or refund within 30 days; Although we trust the premium design and high-end quality of our product, if you are not satisfied, you can ask for a full refund with no additional questions asked. If you have any questions about our products, please log in to your account, check the order ID and click “Contact Seller” to contact us;Our customer service will solve your problem within 24 hours

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

  • When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.
  • Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights with 2 GFCI Outlet

Specification

Voltage: 110-125v

Color:White

Power Source: Corded-Electric

14.5 AWG Input Wire

Max Load : 1080w

Installation Type: Hardwired/Wall Mount

Sensing Range: Distance 33FT, Angle 270°

Material: Aluminum & Tempered Glass

Color: Matte Black & Hand-painting Golden Edge

Base Type: E26 Base, 100W Max.

Read more

3 Upgraded Motion Sensor Lighting Modes

Just turn the wall switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2sec. to shift to manual mode, keeping 100% brightness at night for 8 hours, but will auto turn off at dawn.

Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection.

These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected. (It is the high mode when it arrives)

Read more

Easy access to any outdoor activity when you need power

About GFCI Outlet

Simply turn on the light and plug in your security cameras, party party décor, power tools, garden tools, etc.

Plugged the device into the GFCI outlet, if the device is not powered, please check the following steps:

1) Please check whether the device is plugged into the GFCI outlet tightly.

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

Weather Resistance & Durability

In addition to the rust-resistant aluminum and water-resistant matter black coating, this exterior house light has passed salt spray testing and multiple weather conditions such as heavy rain, snowstorms, hurricanes and hot sun to protect the light body. The sturdy aluminum material and tempered glass ensure that it will not rust or corrode for years

Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor

Upgrade the dusk to dawn motion sensor, through infrared induction, when the detection of motion will light up, no detection when closed, to save you power.

GFCI Outlet

Built-in 2 GFCI OUTLET for your outdoor power supply with added protection against surges, short circuits and other electrical faults

Product Description

Why Choose OurWarm Snowman Porch Light Covers?

Perfect Size: OurWarm Christmas snowman porch light covers are approximately 12.2×10.2×6 inches, which can fit over most porch lights and garage lights.Premium Light Transmitting Material: The holiday porch light covers are made of high-quality EVA textured plastic which has good light transmission. Sparkling light adds holiday cheer to your home’s exterior, both day and night.Classic Design: OurWarm Christmas porch light cover is designed with a cute smiley snowman, black hat, red nose, and blush cheeks. Perfect for decorating your outdoor porch light, your garage door lights, or even your lamp post for home decorations!Professional Brand: OurWarm Specialize in Providing Perfect Service for parties, such as Wedding, Home parties, Halloween, Christmas, Graduation, Fall, and Thanksgiving.

Features

1. Greet family and friends with a glowing welcome from this cute snowman.

2. Protect the bulb from being damaged or covered and gather the light for a better view. Perfect decorations for your home, workspaces, family gatherings, banquets, etc.

Specifications Color: As shown Material: High-quality EVA textured plastic Size：12.2×10.2×6 inches Package Including: 2 packs + extra elastic strap Package: Kraft paper box

Premium Material

The outdoor snowman decoration is made of high-quality EVA textured plastic with a crystallized texture that looks like snow.

Easy for installation

Each snowman light cover is equipped with elastic straps for better flexibility and a 30% increase in service life. Just Loop the strap over your outdoor porch light.

Unique Design

The cute smiley snowman light cover has a red nose and blush cheek with a black hat, matched with classic red fruits and holly leaves elements to enhance the festive atmosphere.

【Christmas Porch Light Covers】 Snowman porch light cover measures 12.2×10.2×6 inches, which can fit over most porch lights and garage lights. You can decorate the porch by Installing these two light covers to make your porch lights out of tedious and create a welcoming entry for garages, patios, and other entryways. Merry Christmas!

Perfect for any Christmas theme decoration.
【Premium Light Transmitting Material】 The outdoor snowman decoration is made of high-quality EVA textured plastic with a crystallized texture that looks like snow. Also, the holiday porch light covers have good light transmission. Sparkling light adds holiday cheer to your home’s exterior, both day and night. The waterproof material makes it work perfectly in most weather.
【Easy Installation】 Each snowman light cover is equipped with elastic straps for better flexibility and a 30% increase in service life. Just Loop the strap over your outdoor porch light, your garage door lights, or even your lamp post, and you needn’t worry about the lamp cover falling anymore. When not in use, you can put it away and use it the next winter
【Multiple Applications】 These holiday porch light covers go right over your existing fixtures to give any light a festive touch. You can also give it as a gift to your family and friends. The best ideal Christmas gift.
